channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0534; 09:20AM; 10324 N Aldea Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ROpK2k; #GranadaHills; First arriving 20 LAFD Firefighters took just 19 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire within an unoccupied 2,069 square foot one-story home. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 87; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 E103 E18 E275 E287 E296 E70 E87 EM15 RA83 RA87 RA96 T75 T87 T96; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0534; 09:01AM; 10324 N Aldea Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ROpK2k; #GranadaHills; PRELIM: Fire in one room of an unoccupied one story home, possibly extending to the attic. ; FS 87; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 E103 E18 E275 E287 E296 E70 E87 EM15 RA83 RA87 RA96 T75 T87 T96; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update Multi-Patient Traffic Collision; INC#1952; 01:00AM; NB 5 Fwy x Esperanza St; MAP: https://bit.ly/48Tvqz5; #BoyleHeights; Firefighters responded to a seven-vehicle traffic collision with six total patients. Firefighters/Paramedics evaluated all six and transported four to the hospital with non-life-threatening injuries. Two people opted not to be taken to the hospital by LAFD ambulance. Unknown age/gender/condition. ; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E16 E2 E202 E203 E25 E447 E9 EM1 EM13 EM14 EM9 RA1 RA10 RA17 RA2 RA25 RA3 RA801 RA803 RA810 RA900 T2 T3; CH4; 12; Nicholas Prange

Multi-Patient Traffic Collision; INC#1952; 11:50PM; NB 5 Fwy x Esperanza St; MAP: https://bit.ly/48Tvqz5; #BoyleHeights; Approximately six-vehicle traffic collision with a *preliminary* count of six patients.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E16 E2 E202 E25 E447 EM1 EM13 EM14 EM9 RA1 RA10 RA17 RA2 RA25 RA801 RA803 RA810 RA900 T2; CH4; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1713; 08:59PM; 12411 W Osborne St; MAP: https://bit.ly/48RNNEk; #Pacoima; Firefighters responded to a *two-story* townhome with smoke showing. LAPD reported a person having a behavioral emergency inside the structure, and took that person into custody for safety. Crews found fire on the first and second floors of the residential unit, and mounted a coordinated fire attack, with interior hose lines and vertical (rooftop) ventilation. It took 46 firefighters 23 minutes to extinguish the flames. Four patients were evaluated by LAFD Paramedics for smoke inhalation, including one LAPD Officer who was effecting a rescue. Of the four patients evaluated, only the person experiencing the behavioral emergency will be transported. Cause remains under investigation.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AR1 BC10 BC12 E275 E289 E298 E7 E75 E77 E89 E98 EM15 PI3 RA7 RA77 RA98 T75 T89 T98; CH8; 13 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1713; 08:36PM; 12411 W Osborne St; MAP: https://bit.ly/48RNNEk; #Pacoima; Three-story residential building with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AR1 BC10 BC12 E275 E289 E298 E7 E75 E77 E89 E98 EM15 RA7 RA77 RA98 T75 T89 T98; CH9; 13 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Brush Fire; INC#0490; 09:21AM; 9085 W Alto Cedro Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/48QMoxO; #BeverlyCrest; A sanitation truck caught fire and, per protocol, dumped the burning contents in the middle of the street. Firefighters arrived and quickly deployed hose lines as the roadside brush was being singed by flames stoked by the wind. Crews prevented the fire from extending into the brush, and extinguished the burning trash in the road in 22 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause unknown.; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC14 BC9 CM40 CM42 E108 E109 E278 E290 E41 E58 E71 E97 E99 EM14 H1 H4 H5 HA1 HA4 HA5 T78 T90; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#0490; 08:59AM; 9085 W Alto Cedro Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/48QMoxO; #BeverlyCrest; Heavy fire consuming a sanitation truck, and spreading into the nearby brush, with approximately 13 mph winds fueling the fire.; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC14 BC9 E108 E109 E278 E290 E41 E58 E71 E97 E99 EM14 H1 H4 H5 HA1 HA4 HA5 T78 T90; CH5; 17; Nicholas Prange

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 01/10/2024 INC#1154

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1154; 03:56PM; 1212 S Olive St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tN8rqj; #DowntownLA; Firefighters arrived to a vacant one-story commercial with heavy smoke showing. Crews located a storage closet/structure inside the building with stored building materials on fire, which burned up through the roof in one location and damaged some large structural components. Ultimately, it took 68 firefighters 26 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 AR33 AR39 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E227 E26 E5 E9 E95 EM1 EM11 EM5 HE1 HR3 RA10 RA13 RA810 RA9 SO1 SQ21 SQ95 T10 T11 T15 T27 T3 T9 UR5 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1154; 03:30PM; 1212 S Olive St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tN8rqj; #DowntownLA; Approx 100' x 100' one-story commercial building with heavy smoke showing and one adjacent building threatened to the right of the address (delta side). Defensive mode.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E26 E5 E9 E95 EM1 EM11 EM5 HR3 RA10 RA13 RA810 RA9 SQ21 SQ95 T10 T11 T15 T27 T3 T9 UR5 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Nicholas Prange
